channel.title: Gfx Looping

item.title: Gfx Looping
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:3, topic:533738”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=652533.msg4372334#msg4372334 date=1381037916]

do { /* GFX HERE */ } while { /* blah */ }
[/quote]
What the fudge is that
no

while(…) {}
or
do {} while();
not
do {} while {}[/quote]oh shit, sorry op, gave you faulty info. not sure why I messed that up

Read full topic

item.description:
